alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country; South Central Utah; Upper Sevier River Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 10:58PM MST until January 17 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MONDAY TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches below 5500 feet, 5 to 10 inches above 5500 feet. * WHERE...Upper Sevier River Valleys and Bryce Canyon Country. * WHEN...From 5 AM Monday to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Bryce Canyon Country; South Central Utah; Upper Sevier River Valleys
